snippet: St. Louis removed the interim tag from Jim Crews’s job title and named him head coach after a record-setting season.
abstract: St Louis University removes interim tag from men's basketball coach Jim Crews after record-setting season; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis removed the interim tag from Jim Crews’s job title and named him head coach after a record-setting season.

headline.seo: St. Louis Names Jim Crews Head Coach
headline.main: St. Louis Names Crews Head Coach
